title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagining incident response with MCP on AWS (DEV340)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 AWS 上使用 MCP 重新构想事件响应 (DEV340)
abstract: Enhance incident response with MCP-powered agents that understand your AWS platform context. In this session, you’ll learn how to build agents correlating symptoms across services, suggesting likely root causes, and automating initial remediation steps using Amazon EventBridge, AWS Lambda, and Amazon Bedrock. Discover how these agents deliver precise, real-time context to responders, enabling faster, more informed decision-making. Leave with proven patterns and a clear blueprint to dramatically reduce mean time to resolution (MTTR) in your AWS environments.
abstract_cn: 通过理解您的AWS平台上下文的MCP驱动代理增强事件响应。在本次会议中，您将学习如何构建能够关联跨服务症状、建议可能根本原因并使用Amazon EventBridge、AWS Lambda和Amazon Bedrock自动执行初始修复步骤的代理。了解这些代理如何向响应人员提供精确的实时上下文，从而实现更快速、更明智的决策。带走经过验证的模式和清晰的蓝图，以显著降低AWS环境中的平均解决时间(MTTR)。
